Package controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
Threadable, Serializable, Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GreenhouseControls
public class Controller extends Object implements Serializable, Threadable
Controller Class - The reusable framework for control systems.
